title: This Gaming PC Is DIFFERENT! Razer Tomahawk Changes The Game
description: Razer showed off their new Tomahawk Gaming Desktop with the Intel NUC 9 Extreme.  The look is VERY different and extremely compact.    A special thanks to Phanteks, Razer, be quiet! and Thermaltake for sponsoring our trip to CES 2020.    Subscribe    As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #razertomahawk #intelnuc9 #nuc9extreme #ces2020
